record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, MAY 12, 2008, AT 2 P.M.
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, MAY 12, 2008, AT 2 P.M. -- (Senate - May 08, 2008)

[Page: S3986]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that it stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 5:42 p.m., adjourned until Monday, May 12, 2008, at 2 p.m.
